name: marketapp
description: MarketApp.ws gift marketplace â€” browse, buy, sell, and manage NFT gifts on MarketApp
author: Kloveren (t.me/morganlegacy)

tools.name: marketapp_collections
tools.description: List gift collections on MarketApp with floor price, volume, and listing stats

tools.name: marketapp_gifts_onsale
tools.description: Get gifts currently on sale on MarketApp, filterable by collection, model, symbol, backdrop, price range

tools.name: marketapp_gift_history
tools.description: Get recent gift sales history on MarketApp

tools.name: marketapp_nft_info
tools.description: Get detailed NFT info by on-chain address from MarketApp

tools.name: marketapp_collection_attributes
tools.description: Get attribute breakdown (models, backdrops, symbols) for a gift collection on MarketApp

tools.name: marketapp_buy_nft
tools.description: Buy an NFT listed for sale on MarketApp (on-chain transaction)

tools.name: marketapp_list_nft
tools.description: List an NFT for sale on MarketApp at a specified TON price

tools.name: marketapp_change_price
tools.description: Change the sale price of an NFT already listed on MarketApp

tools.name: marketapp_cancel_sale
tools.description: Cancel the sale of an NFT on MarketApp, removing it from the marketplace
